Dear retail;

 

I hope this email finds you well.

                                                                                                                   

Kind reminder on sharing the insurance certificate requirement stated in our rental contract. As per the terms of the agreement, it is mandatory for all tenants to maintain insurance coverage for the rented unit.

We kindly request that you provide us with a copy of your new insurance, clearly indicating that the rented unit is covered. This will help ensure that both parties are protected in case of any unforeseen incidents or damages.

Kindly note that those who do not submit the document on the mentioned date will result in a penalty.

 

We trust that you understand the importance of this matter and will take the necessary steps to ensure compliance with the terms of our contract.

 

Best regards,

Best regards,
